lead_paragraph: After a graphic designer in California invites his ex-boyfriend to spend the weekend, lovemaking and much talk ensue.

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Lazy Eye,’ Yakking Ex-Lovers Reconnect
headline.main: Review: In ‘Lazy Eye,’ Yakking Ex-Lovers Reconnect

snippet: After a graphic designer in California invites his ex-boyfriend to spend the weekend, lovemaking and much talk ensue....
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie Lazy Eye, written and directed by Tim Kirkman.
